This method returns the Grid the Tetromino is placed in.

This method returns the height of the Entity's sprite.

This method returns the Image of the sprite corresponding to the given shape.

This method returns the Entity's sprite as an Image.

This method returns the state of the keys for the KeyListener.

grid - Variable in class trapomino.Animal
 
Grid - Class in trapomino
This class will contain and manage all blocks in the grid, including Animals and Tetrominos.

This constructor defines the Grid, the sprites, and the shapes.
